Government Tender Announcement
## Cannada Buys
**Site Title**
 Voitures de location

### Government Contract
**Contract ID**: PW-22-01011788
**Contract Title**: Rentals in Atsugi, Japan – 04 Nov 22 to 21 Nov 22
**Publication Date**: 2022-10-31
**Closing Date**: 2022-11-01T10:00:00

### Details
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide rental vehicles for use by Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) personnel in Atsugi, Japan.

**Objective**: The CAF requires rental vehicles without drivers for a period of seventeen (17) days from 04 Nov 22 to 21 Nov 22. Fifty (50) personnel will need car rentals for the duration of their stay.

**Exigences**:

*   Four (4) full-size sedans
*   Twelve (12) passenger vans
*   The vendor must provide vehicles that have a minimum of a one quarter (¼) tank of fuel upon issuance and agree to accept the vehicle to be returned with the same quantity of fuel that it was issued with.
*   The vendor must provide a local point of contact and provide a contact number for a representative to respond to CAF queries on a twenty four (24) hours, seven (7) days a week (24/7) basis.
*   The vendor must ensure that all documentation, including insurance, to allow more than one driver per vehicle is prepared and provided at no extra cost to the CAF.

### Responsabilités
*   Les FAC fourniront le carburant des véhicules pendant leur utilisation.
*   Les FAC s'assureront que tous les véhicules sont remis avec la même quantité et le même type de carburant (diesel ou essence) qu'au moment de la prise en charge.
*   Les FAC communiqueront avec la police pour déposer et obtenir un rapport de police en cas de pertes, de dommages et de réparations concernant le véhicule.
*   Les FAC ne sont pas responsables des pertes ou dommages découlant d’une usure normale.

### Attachments
Veuillez consulter la documentation fournie ci-dessous pour obtenir des renseignements supplémentaires.
